show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #48 Kurt Dale "We all struggle"
subtitle: #48 Kurt Dale "We all struggle"
summary:
Extra special episode this week in the Eastes Media studio I am joined by not only my good friend Kurt Dale to tell his story about the journey that he and his family have been on, I'm also joined by my lovely better half, Tonia for her unique perspective. Please stay to the end, Kurt lets his guard down and talks about his struggle with mental health, something that I struggle with as well. 

Buy from Dale Family Farms

https://www.dalefamilyfarms.com/
